languages.text: "Пролито довольно крови. Я дарю этому обманутому дураку жизнь, и пусть корабль знает, что я — не чудовище, каким меня рисует Немезит".
"Enough blood has been spilt. I hereby pardon this deluded fool, to show the rest of the vessel that I am not the monster that Nemesite paints me to be."
languages.original_text: "Пролито довольно крови. Я дарю этому обманутому дураку жизнь, и пусть корабль знает, что я — не чудовище, каким меня рисует Немезит".

traits.locale_text: "Enough blood has been spilled. I hereby grant this deluded fool a pardon to let the vessel know that I am not the monster that Nemesite paints me to be."
"Enough blood has been spilled. I hereby grant this deluded fool a pardon to let the vessel know that I am not the monster that Nemesite paints me to be."
"Enough blood has been spilled. I hereby pardon this deluded fool, to show the rest of the vessel that I am not the monster that Nemesite paints me to be."
"Enough blood has been spilled. I hereby pardon this deluded fool, to show the rest of the vessel that I am not the monster that Nemesite paints me to be."
"Enough blood has been spilt. I hereby pardon this deluded fool, to show the rest of the vessel that I am not the monster that Nemesite paints me to be."
"Enough blood has been spilt. I hereby pardon this deluded fool, to show the rest of the vessel that I am not the monster that Nemesite paints me to be."

languages.text: "Es wurde genug Blut vergossen. Ich begnadige hiermit diesen verwirrten Narren, um dem Rest des Schiffs zu zeigen, dass ich nicht das Monster bin, als das Nemesit mich darstellt."
languages.original_text: "Enough blood has been spilt. I hereby pardon this deluded fool, to show the rest of the vessel that I am not the monster that Nemesite paints me to be."

traits.locale_text: "Es wurde genug Blut vergossen. Ich begnadige hiermit diesen verwirrten Narren, um dem Rest des Schiffs zu zeigen, dass ich nicht das Monster bin, als das Nemesit mich darstellt."

languages.text: «Ya se ha derramado suficiente sangre. Declaro indultado a este pobre necio, para demostrar al resto de la nave que no soy el monstruo que Nemesitio dice que soy».
languages.original_text: "Enough blood has been spilt. I hereby pardon this deluded fool, to show the rest of the vessel that I am not the monster that Nemesite paints me to be."

traits.locale_text: «Ya se ha derramado suficiente sangre. Declaro indultado a este pobre necio, para demostrar al resto de la nave que no soy el monstruo que Nemesitio dice que soy».

languages.text: 「血を流すのはもうたくさんだ。ネメサイトが描くような怪物ではないことを船内に示すため、騙されたこの愚か者をここに赦す」
languages.original_text: "Enough blood has been spilt. I hereby pardon this deluded fool, to show the rest of the vessel that I am not the monster that Nemesite paints me to be."

traits.locale_text: 「血を流すのはもうたくさんだ。ネメサイトが描くような怪物ではないことを船内に示すため、騙されたこの愚か者をここに赦す」

languages.text: “死的人已经够多了。我愿意原谅这个被欺骗的蠢货，让船上所有人看到，我并不是涅墨斯特说的那种怪物。”
languages.original_text: "Enough blood has been spilt. I hereby pardon this deluded fool, to show the rest of the vessel that I am not the monster that Nemesite paints me to be."

traits.locale_text: “死的人已经够多了。我愿意原谅这个被欺骗的蠢货，让船上所有人看到，我并不是涅墨斯特说的那种怪物。”

languages.text: « Le sang a suffisamment coulé. Je gracie cet illuminé afin de montrer au reste du vaisseau que je ne suis pas le monstre pour lequel Némésite cherche à me faire passer. »
languages.original_text: "Enough blood has been spilt. I hereby pardon this deluded fool, to show the rest of the vessel that I am not the monster that Nemesite paints me to be."

traits.locale_text: « Le sang a suffisamment coulé. Je gracie cet illuminé afin de montrer au reste du vaisseau que je ne suis pas le monstre pour lequel Némésite cherche à me faire passer. »

languages.text: "Yeterince kan döküldü. Gemidekilere, Nemezit'in beni göstermeye çalıştığı gibi bir canavar olmadığımı göstermek adına bu akılsız sersemi affediyorum."
languages.original_text: "Enough blood has been spilt. I hereby pardon this deluded fool, to show the rest of the vessel that I am not the monster that Nemesite paints me to be."
